topic.title: ANNEX 24 â€“ CONTRACT CLOSEOUT METRIC REPORT

body.p: Pursuant to 5204.804-1(S-90), the template below shall be used in reporting monthly contract closeout metrics. The electronic version of this template can be found at https://www.secnav.navy.mil/rda/DASN-P/Pages/NMCARS.aspx .
